revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Birch.png|30px]]Professor Birch || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Birch's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player about updates to the Hatchery Queue. |- | [[File:Scientist (male).png|30px]]Tracking Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Oldale Town]] || Tells the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Latios}} and {{Pokemon|Latias}}. |- | [[File:Reporter.png|30px]]Reporter Gabby || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Professor Cozmo || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fallarbor Town]] || Informs the player about [[File:Deoxys.png|30px|link = Battle Frontier]] [[Battle Frontier|Deoxys]]. |- | Soot Collector || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Lavaridge Town]] || Informs the player about the [[Flutes]] Location and about the Gem cost of Using [[Flutes]]. |- | Weatherman || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Informs the player about the several forms of {{Pokemon|Castform}}. |- | [[File:Pokémon Ranger (female).png|30px]]Pokémon Ranger Catherine || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Tells the player about the overuse of the [[Dowsing Machine]]. |- | [[File:Steven.png|30px]]Steven || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || "Awards" the player a picture of an invisble Kecleon [[File:Kecleon Drawing.png|30px]]. |- | Astronomer || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Jirachi}}. |- | Diver || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || Teaches the player about Dungeon Loot rates increasing with clears |- | [[File:Wallace.png|30px]]Gym Leader Wallace || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Sootopolis City]] || Tells the player about the [[Cave of Origin|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Hoenn|requirement]] needed to unlock {{Pokemon|Groudon}} and {{Pokemon|Kyogre}}. |- | [[File:Regi Hints.png|30px|link=Questlines#The Three Golems]]Hidden Message || [[Sealed Chamber]] || Strange markings that leads to the [[Questlines#The Three Golems|Regis]] chamber. |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Braille Enthusiast || [[Sealed Chamber]] || Helps the player read the strange markings in the walls. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
